componentDescription: Renders a modal dialog with various styles and states according to the design guidelines.

buttonColor.description: The color of the close button in the header.

iconSize.description: The size of the close button in the header.

shape.description: Determines whether the modal should have square or rounded edges.

isFullScreen.description: If set to true, the modal will occupy the full width and height of the screen.

buttonPosition.description: Indicates the presence of a close button and its position within the header.

onClose.description: The callback function to be executed when the close button is clicked or pressed.

blur.description: The degree of blurriness applied to the overlay.

isOpen.description: If set to true, the modal will be visible.

isClosePrevented.description: If set to true, the modal will remain open when the overlay is clicked.

position.description: The positioning of the modal container.

shadow.description: Applies a shadow effect to the button.
